meanings.definition: Having the most pronounced pouch or pouches.
meanings.sent1: The kangaroo with the pouchiest belly hopped around the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The mother kangaroo had the pouchiest pouch to carry her baby.
meanings.sent3: The pouchiest squirrel in the park kept all its acorns safe.
meanings.sent4: Her backpack was the pouchiest, fitting all her school supplies.
meanings.sent5: The pouchiest cloud in the sky looked like a giant cotton ball.

meanings.definition: Showing the most prominent pouch or pouches.
meanings.sent1: The pouchiest marsupial in the exhibit was the kangaroo.
meanings.sent2: The wallaby had the pouchiest appearance among the animals.
meanings.sent3: The pouchiest purse she owned could hold all her belongings.
meanings.sent4: His jacket had the pouchiest pockets, perfect for storing snacks.
meanings.sent5: The pouchiest flower in the garden bloomed brightly in the sun.
